VTU Result Notifier Enter Your USN Begin Service Stop Service Invalid USN. Check And Try Again. Service Started! Service Stopped <<<<<<< HEAD About Us Settings

Now, get your results ASAP!
 	Enter your USN before results are published. We'll send you the results after they are available.
	VTU server responds poorly when the results are published. VTU Result Notifier is an Android app that aims to solve this problem. The app is determined to provide the result once you enter the USN. Gone are the days when you reloaded the page multiple times with frustration. Please provide feedback, suggestions or report bugs at:

the.era.labs@gmail.com 
If you want to try out or contribute to the open source Python project that inspired this project, fork it at:
https://gitlab.com/aadarsh977/vtuResults!

======= Last Result Enter your USN below and push 'Start'. A Service will check your result for you while you do your work. Once your result is available, it will automatically download it. A Notification would appear from where you can see your result. >>>>>>> 019194603fd07d1a15a53541689e397e2d321671
